greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle T(n,k): T(n,k) gives the A153452(m_k) such that A056239(m_k) = n, [1<=k<=A000041(n)], sorted by m_k, read by rows. Sequence A060240 is this sequence's permutation.
link: Alois P. Heinz, Rows n = 0..26, flattened
maple: b:= proc(n, i) option remember; `if`(n=0 or i<2, [2^n],
mathematica: g[n_] := g[n] = If[n == 1, 1, Sum[g[n/q*If[q == 2, 1, NextPrime[q, -1]]], {q, FactorInteger[n][[All, 1]]}]];
b[n_, i_] := b[n, i] = If[n == 0 || i < 2, {2^n}, Flatten[Table[Map[ #*Prime[i]^j&, b[n - i*j, i - 1]], {j, 0, n/i}]]];
T /@ Range[0, 10] // Flatten (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Feb 16 2021, after _Alois P. Heinz_ *)
results.author: _Naohiro Nomoto_, Dec 31 2008
